Articles.Content:
Hello. my name is One-Way Gaming (OWG for short) and allow me to reveal Kerbal Konflict; Wartime! it is picking up 30 years after the events of Kerbal Konflict; Peacetime (check out my channel if you want to see the backstory. Also consider subscribing!). Anyway, without further adue, here it is!

I will add more to this post when new videos come out! Thanks and I hope you enjoy(ed)!
